data: If my friend the engineer had not told me the Tube was dangerous, I would not have bought a ticket on that fatal night, and the world would never have learned the story of the Golden Cavern and the City of the Dead.
Tube | Golden Cavern | City of the Dead
Hansen, L. Taylor (Lucile Taylor), 1897-1976; Wessolowski, Hans Waldemar, 1894?-1948 [Illustrator]
